title: Gen Types executor
description: Generates TypeScript types from Supabase schema

projectId.description: Supabase project ID. If not provided, generates types from local database.

outputPath.description: Output file path relative to workspace root. Defaults to 'database.types.ts'.

schema.description: Comma-separated list of schemas to include (e.g., 'public,auth'). If not provided, uses default schema.
